author: legoz
title: All around fun
review: This was my first lego set that I got for my birthday. I played with it a lot when I was little. Even though I had to put it away and it became disasembled over time, a lot of the parts are fun for building other things with other bricks, or just keep it together to play with. A great addition to any lego town.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (City) - Fire Fighters' Lift Truck Review
review:
This is a fun set to have and fun to play with as well. It's also a nice addition to any LEGO city for sure. The build is very easy and lot's of fun, too. We also don't need to worry about stickers. The trailer of the truck can be removed very easily and the ceiling of the truck can be detached as well. The trailer has a hose on the back and the platform with the crane can be removed very easily as well. The platform has two stands on each side and a crane which sviwels full 360Â°. You can also move it up and down. As I told you in the beginning: It's a fun set to have.

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
